ValidationRule.description: When Discrepancy type "Onboarding Discrepancy" is selected then the following fields are also required: Onboarding Discrepancy Category, Onboarding Discrepancy Reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name ='P&C Discrepancy', ISPICKVAL(Discrepancy_Type__c ,'Onboarding Discrepancy'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Onboarding_Discrepancy_Category__c ,'') , ISPICKVAL( Onboarding_Discrepancy_Reason__c ,'') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate Onboarding Discrepancy Category and Onboarding Discrepancy Reason.
